document.full_text: wanjiru shattered the 24-year-old olympic record in the marathon in 2008, becoming the youngest winner of the event, and also won marathons in london and chicago.
document.title: sammy wanjiru, marathon champion, is dead at 24
lines_and_colors: wanjiru shattered the 24-year-old olympic record in the marathon in 2008, becoming the youngest winner of the event, and also won marathons in london and chicago.
